description: Options for setting the layout rule on a page.

properties.description: No layout rule on the page as it resizes.
properties.name: OFF

properties.description: Scale objects on the page as it resizes.
properties.name: SCALE

properties.description: Recenter objects on the page as it resizes.
properties.name: RECENTER

properties.description: Use guide slicing to resize objects on the page as it resizes.
properties.name: GUIDE_BASED

properties.description: Reposition and resize objects on the page as it resizes.
properties.name: OBJECT_BASED

properties.description: Use layout rule from the page's applied master page.
properties.name: USE_MASTER

properties.description: Use existing layout rule setting on the page. Used for creating alternate layouts.
properties.name: PRESERVE_EXISTING

name: LayoutRuleOptions
